short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays positive affirmations automatically on the screen to manifest your best life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever you change the webpage, a new affirmation is displayed. All affirmations are general enough to be applicable to all genders.

Why this extension exists? 
Repetition is good for conscious manifesting. When browsing the web, your mind is set on a specific thing you want to access on the internet. Your critical thinking is thus occupied and doesn't disturb / block the effectiveness of an affirmation shown on screen with negative beliefs and other limitations. The affirmation is relatively short, so you can skim through it quickly. Gradually, you will impress your subconscious mind with these affirmations. Enjoy


Disclaimer: The affirmations provided should not be construed as a substitute for essential medical, legal, or other professional care. The affirmations are not meant to replace any medicine. Please, for any health-related issues consult a doctor first.
